snippet.title: Hoglands Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🕹️WISHLIST ON STEAM🕹️: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2210240/Hoglands/?utm_source=Youtube&utm_campaign=video&medium=organic&utm_content=Hoglands_Announcement_Trailer&utm_term=video_youtube

🐷Hoglands🐷 this is a 2D side-scrolling base defense strategy with RPG elements where you will be protecting your kingdom against bloodthirsty, undead pigs. Gather resources, build a base, raise an army, improve your hero and lead defense of your lands.

Follow us on social media:
➤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Piggy_Games_Ua
➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100088077327617
➤ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Hoglands/
